H0.text: For which conductor was the NBC Symphony orchestra created in 1937. Arturo Rodzinski

H1.text: For which conductor was the NBC Symphony orchestra created in 1937. Leopold Stokowski

H2.text: For which conductor was the NBC Symphony orchestra created in 1937. Serge Koussevitzky

H3.text: For which conductor was the NBC Symphony orchestra created in 1937. Toscanini

A4.text: The NBC Symphony Orchestra was a radio orchestra conceived by David Sarnoff, the president of the Radio Corporation of America, the parent corporation of the National Broadcasting Company especially for the conductor Arturo Toscanini.
